metadata.title: CVE-2018-5106 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Style editor traffic in the Developer Tools can be routed through a serviceworker hosted on a third party website if a user selects error links whenthese tools are open. This can allow style editor information used withinDeveloper Tools to leak cross-origin. This vulnerability affects Firefox <58.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5106` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
